title: 2.1 Master Challenge 2
question:
Find a game on the Scratch platform and write how you can improve it. Follow the steps below:
Go to https://scratch.mit.edu/ and click Explore. You will see various Scratch projects
To Ô¨Ånd games, click on Games.

Select and click on a game you like and play it.
How would you improve this game? Share the game with your friends and collect their feedback. Check if their views match with yours.
